info.title: History
info.description: Get 20 years historical weather data in Europe + Pollen + UV + Air Quality data
info.x-long-description:
---- For the past 15 years we have been collecting and analyzing weather data with our own meteorological unit, to provide the most accurate forecast possible for any given location in the world. We believe that weather is still an under-valued key business component. With this API  you can enrich and improve your data models with highly accurate historical weather data. ---

--- This API provides weather historical and forecast data: for a given location (latitude/longitude) or ZIP-Code (Country/Zip), you can get weather conditions on daily or hourly level--- 

--- The historical data covers entire Europe and starts from 2015. For Germany, the weather data is available from 2005. The pollen data and air quality data starts from 2020-08-10 and 2016, respectively.

--- But that is not all! We also collect and analyze a lot of other data not available via the API. Just shoot us a short email (info@meteonomiqs.com) to get the full catalog and pricing.---

List of all available info:

Daily data:
1. air quality (Fill rate depends on the next station):
	a) Distance: distance to the next station for air quality [m]
	b) CO
	c) NO2
	d) O3
	e) PM10
	f) SO2
2. anomaly:
	a) long_time_t2m_avg: long time daily mean temperature [°C]
	b) long_time_t2m_max: long time daily maximum temperature [°C]
	c) long_time_t2m_min: long time daily minimum temperature [°C]
	d) temp_anomaly_max: difference between long time daily maximum temperature and daily maximum temperature [°C]
	e) temp_anomaly_mean: difference between long time daily mean temperature and daily mean temperature [°C]
	f) temp_anomaly_min: difference between long time daily minimum temperature and daily minimum temperature [°C]	
3. astronomy: 
	a) max_sunshine: maximal possible sunhours [h], the time between sunrise and sunset
	b) sunrise: sunrise
	c) sunset: sunset
4. location:
	a) date: observation/forecast date
	b) height: height above sealevel [m]
	c) latitude: latitude [°]
	d) longitude: longitude [°]
5. meta:
	a) additional_info: additional information - normally not filled
	b) errors: error messages - normally not filled
	c) sources: data sources (Not sure if we want to share this)
6. occurrence:
	Normally not filled
	a) max_cloud_cover
	b) max_precipitation_intensity
	c) max_temperature
	d) min_cloud_cover
	e) min_temperature
7. pollen:
	a) day: observation/forecast day
	b) alder
	c) ambrosia
	d) ash
	e) birch
	f) grasses:
	g) hazel
	h) mugwort
	i) rye
8. weather:
	a) air_pressure: air pressure on sea level [hpa]
	b) air_temp_max: maximum air temperature [°C]
	c) air_temp_mean: mean air temperature [°C]
	d) air_temp_min: minimum air temperature [°C]
	e) cloud_cover: cloud cover from 0:no clouds to 8:totally cloudy
	f) dew_point: dew point [°C]
	g) evaporation_pressure: evaporation pressure
	h) precipitation: precipitation [l/m² = mm]
	i) precipitation_form: precipitation form - 0:no precipitation, 4 undefined, 6 rain, 7 snow, 8 rain and snow
	j) relative_humidity: relative humidity [%]
	k) snowfall: snowfall [mm]
	l) sunshine: sunshine duration [h]
	m) wind_avg: mean wind speed [m/s]
	n) wind_direction: wind direction [°] - 0°: north, 90°: east, 180°: south, 270°: west, 360°: north
	o) wind_peak: maximum wind gust [m/s]
9. weather_signals:
	a) ice_day: ice day flag
	b) rain_day: rain day flag
        c) snow_day: snow day flag
	d) summer_day: summer day flag
	e) tropical_night: tropical night flag
10. windchill:
	a) temp_max_windchill: maximum windchill [°C]
	b) temp_mean_windchill: mean windchill [°C]
	c) temp_min_windchill: min windchill [°C]


Hourly data:
1. air quality (Fill rate depends on the next station):
	a) Distance: distance to the next station for air quality [m]
	b) CO
	c) NO2
	d) O3
	e) PM10
	f) SO2
2. astronomy: 
	a) max_sunshine: maximal possible sunhours [h], the time between sunrise and sunset
	b) sunrise: sunrise
	c) sunset: sunset
3. location:
	a) date: observation/forecast date
	b) height: height above sealevel [m]
	c) latitude: latitude [°]
	d) longitude: longitude [°]
4. meta:
	a) additional_info: additional information - normally not filled
	b) errors: error messages - normally not filled
5. weather:
	a) air_pressure: air pressure on sea level [hpa]
	b) air_temp_anomaly: difference between long time air temperature and hourly mean air temperature [°C] (for Germany)
	c) air_temp_long_time_avg: long time mean hourly air temperature [°C] (for Germany)
	d) air_temp_mean: hourly mean air temperature [°C]
	e) cloud_cover: cloud cover from 0:no clouds to 8:totally cloudy
	f) dew_point: dew point [°C]
	g) evaporation_pressure: evaporation pressure
	h) precipitation: precipitation [l/m² = mm]
	i) precipitation_form: precipitation form - 0:no precipitation, 4 undefined, 6 rain, 7 snow, 8 rain and snow
	j) relative_humidity: relative humidity [%]
	k) snowfall: snowfall [mm]
	l) sunshine: sunshine duration [min]
	m) time: observation/forecast time
	n) wind_avg: mean wind speed [m/s]
	o) wind_direction: wind direction [°] - 0°: north, 90°: east, 180°: south, 270°: west, 360°: north
	p) wind_peak: maximum wind gust [m/s]
	q) windchill: windchill [°C]


# Response Codes

List of response codes returned by wetter.com API

### 2xx Success
Status Code | Status Message
------------|----------------
200 | OK
204 | No Content

### 3xx Redirection
Status Code | Status Message
------------|----------------
301 | Moved Permanently
304 | Not Modified

### 4xx Client errors
Status Code | Status Message
------------|----------------
400 | Bad Request
401 | Unauthorized
403 | Forbidden
404 | Not Found
405 | Method Not Allowed
406 | Not Acceptable
409 | Conflict
429 | Too Many Requests

### 5xx Server errors
Status Code | Status Message
------------|----------------
500 | Internal Server Error
